title: NA server down?
body:
Game Crashed and disconnected from league. MY RANKED GAME!!!! PROMOTION!!!
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
The NA service issues had been resolved by the time you posted this discussion. If the game happened a few hours prior to posting this, they may have been affected by the outage.

If you're still having issues, please let me know.

LoL NA & OCE are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience. Loss Forgiven may or may not have been enabled at the time of your match.
